metadata.title: CVE-2021-33294 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In elfutils 0.183, an infinite loop was found in the function handle_symtabin readelf.c .Which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (infiniteloop) via crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33294` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1+esm1
libasm1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1+esm1
libdw1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1+esm1
libelf1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: elfutils package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1+esm1').
